body:
Sup, I'm Chiddybangmaster, nickname Chiddy, real name Daniel, your choice on what to call me.
I am a minecraft player from overcast, I started playing MC in alpha, I have been with overcast for about 2-3 years now, I used to play on the old MCZone with my friends, legosean10 (yes the moderator -.-) 1Theodore1 (yes... another mod -.-)(we didnt play together much, only when I was with sean :3) trollguy, minecraftianXXX and others who I cant exactly remember :3 soz </3. I own an upcoming MC server called "The Spawner Network" which is halted due to the lack of active devs and the 'little' mojang EULA mishap which I would imagine is something the owners of both overcast and avicus have to think about.
I used to own an YT channel, closed due to 'reasons' and now I just make banners, intros, outros and stuff I guess...
body_tagged:

I own an upcoming MC server called "The Spawner Network" which is halted due to the lack of active devs and the 'little' mojang EULA mishap which I would imagine is something the owners of both overcast and avicus have to think about.
I used to own an YT channel, closed due to 'reasons' and now I just make banners, intros, outros and stuff I guess...

replies.body:
Hello, you seem to be very popular on the forums for someone so new! I'm glad, too, because you seem pretty cool :D
Would you mind answering some questions for me to get to know more about you? If you don't want to, you don't have to-- it's ok :3
1. What's your favorite color and why?
2. If you had one wish to benefit yourself (No donating to charity or anything), what would it be?
3. What do you think the meaning of existence is?
4. Can you easily do 56/24 in your head? (In under 10 seconds)
5. Is your power level over 9000? 
6. If you were a food, what would you be and why?
7. If you were to use a common household object to fight in the zombie apocalypse (Microwave, chair, et cetera), what would it be and why?
8. If you could choose to be an animal and still had the power to morph back into a human any time you wanted, what would it be and why?
